name: Articuno
description: The Freeze Pokémon. A legendary bird Pokémon. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage. It's AC is increased by 2 in arctic conditions, or when it is snowing or hailing.
